title: The Monster of Peladon
dialogue_triumphs: Sarah: 'It's another rotten, gloomy old tunnel.'
Sarah: 'There's nothing "only" about being a girl.'
goofs: The mines apparently have central heating.
In episode one the Doctor opens a secret door which nearly knocks him over. Sarah tries not to burst out laughing.
Lip-reading the Doctor at the end of episode one results in the great line 'What the bloody hell is it?'
In episode four we get a clear look at stunt double Terry Walsh when, as the Doctor, he throws Ettis.
In episode six the hole in the door vanishes along with the Aggedor statue.
When Aggedor dies Nick Hobbs's skin shows as the trousers detach from the boots.
Stuntman Max Faulkner is killed twice, once in an ambush, and three minutes later by Eckersley.

continuity_notes.name: Alpha Centauri

continuity_notes.name: Ice Warriors
continuity_notes.description: Reptilian humanoids from Mars, some serving as Federation troops
continuity_notes.current_status: Militant breakaway faction led by Commander Azaxyr

technobabble: Trisilicate is a vital component of circuits and heat shields.
Spatial distress beacon sends out a general SOS.
roots: Brian Hayles makes 'The Monster of Peladon' a parody of the miners' strike of 1973.
links: The Trial of a Time Lord

locations.name: Peladon
locations.current_status: 50 years after the Doctor's last visit, experiencing political unrest

locations.name: Vega
locations.description: Home planet of a satyr-like race of mining engineers
locations.current_status: Not directly visited in the episode

future_history: Galaxy Five is at war with the Federation. They sue for peace at the end of the story. Ice Warriors are used with other races as Federation troops. Federation law states that the natives of primitive planets are forbidden access to sophisticated weapons.
qv: Dating the Segments of Time, 'The Ark'
additional_notes: The Pel miners' badger-like haircuts are noted as 'Fashion Victims'. The Doctor's line 'I've always been very keen on Survival' is noted as a double entendre.
bottom_line: Its heart is in the right place, but its brain isn't.
